alert.note: Alert for Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 17 at 5:23PM EST until December 21 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central North Carolina, including the following county, Sampson. * WHEN...Until 715 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 521 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Clinton, Harrells, Roseboro, Garland, Newton Grove, Salemburg, Turkey, Falcon, Autryville, Hobbton and Spivey`s Corner.
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Slow down and use caution while driving to avoid hydroplaning.
